bibl.title: An Edition of Unpublished Greek Papyrus Documents from Dionysias and Some Papyri of Cairo Museum with Commentary. Avec résumé en arabe.
bibl.note: 1. P. Kom Ushim Inv. SR 441 = JE 860. Receipt for rent. Dionysias, 3rd cent. AD. - 2. Inv. SR 441 = JE 860. Receipt. Idem, 217/218 AD. - 3. Inv. SR 441 = JE 860. List of Names. Idem, 3rd cent. AD. - 4. P. Cair. Inv. 10600 = SR 1575. Receipt for naulon, Hermupolis, 320-350 AD. - 5. Inv. 10754 = SR 2044. Account of purple. Kom Kousoum (Ashmunen), 323 AD (?). - 6. P. Kom Ushim Inv. SR 441 = JE 860. Receipt for an unknown tax. Dionysias, 13 June 249/250 AD. - 7. P. Cair. Inv. 10364 = SR 1340. Fragment of an agreement of buying a horse. Pathyris, later 2nd cent. BC. - 8. P. Kom Ushim Inv. SR 441 = JE 860. Day-Book. Dionysias, 2nd cent. AD (?). - 9. Inv. SR 441 = JE 860. Nomarchic tax receipt, 1rst half of 3rd cent. AD. - 10. P. Cair. Inv. 10701 = SR 1676. Fragment of an order. Provenance unknown, 6th or 7th cent. AD (?). - 11. P. Kom Ushim Inv. SR 441 = JE 860. Letter. Dionysias, 3rd cent. AD. - 12. P. Cair. Inv. 10597 = SR 1572. Dialysis (Compromissum). Provenance unknown, 5th or 6th cent. AD. - 13. P. Cair. Inv. 10599 = SR 1574. Receipt for a payment in corn. Provenance unknown, 6th or 7th cent. AD.
AHMED ISMAIL ALY Magdy, An Edition of Unpublished Greek Papyrus Documents from Dionysias and Some Papyri of Cairo Museum with Commentary. Avec résumé en arabe.
